body.p: The Board decided to provide guidance on the content of management commentary in the form of a non‑binding practice statement, rather than an IFRS, because it believes it is up to individual jurisdictions to make their own judgements on:

li.p: whether entities should be required to include management commentary in addition to their IFRS financial statements and whether inclusion is necessary to assert compliance with IFRSs;
the level of assurance to which management commentary should be subjected;
the necessity of ‘safe harbour’ provisions in relation to the inclusion of forward-looking information; and
the type of entity that should present management commentary.
